trait.name: Abolethic Vessel
entries: The spawn must obey its aboleth master.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The spawn can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Water Dependency
entries: The spawn takes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) acid damage every 10 minutes it goes without being immersed in water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spawn makes one Spear attack, two Tentacle attacks, and one Psychic Lash attack.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}) and takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage at the start of each of its turns until the grapple ends. The spawn has four tentacles, each of which can grapple one creature.

action.name: Psychic Lash
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage.
